cause.description:
Beginning at 1:00 on October 13th, 450 teams will start the 2007 Fall Crawl for Cancer pub crawl. Each team will make their way to 5 bars, drink 4 pitchers at each bar, and finish up at the Beaumont for the after-party with live music and even more beer. You must be part of a team to participate so make sure you find a team captain and join early. I'm leading at least one team from my office but anyone is welcome to join.
I don't know how to get the donations tab off this page so don't worry about that. It costs $45 to join a team which includes beer all day and a t-shirt. Yea, that's right, I said a t-shirt. Well worth the $45.
1. Umm.... it's for a good cause.
cause.mission: Drink until we have to crawl. Oh yea, raise money for the American Cancer Society.
cause.name: Crawl for Cancer
